notes: Excellent modern high-rise apartment with pristine condition and high-end finishes including built-in cabinetry, recessed lighting, and a fully equipped modern kitchen with oven and range hood. The unit appears very baby-safe with no visible stairs, floor-to-ceiling windows have proper frames, and smooth polished tile floors throughout. Good natural light from large windows with mountain views, video intercom for security, and the building exterior appears well-maintained.
